attributes.action: Abolish the current Television license fees
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The BBC allegedly surveyed the British public with regard to the TV License fees. According to the Corporation, “people would not mind paying more for better quality programmes”.   I have yet to find one person who agrees with the necessity to purchase a TV License let alone continue paying more and more for a poor quality service.   If The BBC really believes the British public want to fund the Corporation why not go pay per view and put an end to the enforced license requirement?  We are told the UK is a free country, really?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
